description: This is not really a trail, but a nice local walk by the Fraser River along a new boardwalk.
directions: Drive on Highway 99 to Steveston Highway (near the tunnel). Head west on the Steveston highway towards Steveston. Turn left (south on Number 1 road), and head into Steveston. Park at southern extremity of No. 1 Road and you are at the boardwalk. There is GPS data attached to this trail (see "download GPS"), which if loaded into your GPS can help you find route points.
title: Brittania Shipyard walkway at Steveston
